III. INVESTIGATION
Rule Code & COF Rule 400.10107
Section Employment policies and procedures; establishment
Description (1) A facility shall establish and follow written employment policies
and procedures that shall assure that staff are emotionally stable
and of suitable health, ability, experience, and education to
perform the duties assigned.
Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
Allegation A staff member made sexually suggestive comments to a youth at
the facility. The staff member asked the youth for sexual favors
multiple times and also threatened to kill the youth and their family
if they told. The staff member is punishing the youth for refusing
their advances.
Investigation Interviews:
Therapist was interviewed via phone on June 9, 2025, in
collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Therapist reported she was
doing a check-in with Youth A today and he reported Staff 1 gave
him the consequence of room time over the weekend. Therapist
reported Youth A stated Staff 1 was in the gym talking with Youth
B on Sunday, June 8, 2025. Youth A overheard Staff 1 say
something inappropriate to Youth B and Youth A laughed about it.
Therapist reported Youth A stated this was when Staff 1 gave him
the consequence for room confinement. Youth A told Therapist
that Staff 1 has been making sexual comments to him such as, “I
will suck your penis if you let me” and “I arch my back for people
like you.” Therapist reported Youth A stated he did not say
anything until now because Staff 1 commented to him that she
would kill his family. She reported Youth A denied any physical,
sexual acts occurring at the facility. Therapist reported she has
been working with Youth A since May 19, 2025, and this is the first
time she has heard about this concern and noted she has not
heard of this concern from any other youth on the pod. She
reported one of the therapeutic goals that Youth A has is to learn
to “tell the truth.”
2

Administrator was interviewed face to face at the facility on
June 10, 2025, in collaboration with MDHHS Worker.
Administrator reported he spoke with Youth A about his grievance
he had written about Staff 1 because he was upset he got room
time. He reported Youth A first reported that Staff 1 was
whispering things into his ear, and it happened on the pod on
Sunday, June 8, 2025. Administrator told Youth A he would follow
up by watching the video and listening to the intercom. He
reported Youth A then stated that he was wrong, and it happened
at the gym on Sunday, June 8, 2025. Administrator reported he
watched the video footage and never saw Staff 1 whisper to Youth
A.
Youth A was interviewed face to face at the facility on June
17, 2025, in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Youth A
reported he told Therapist and Administrator that Staff 1 had been
making inappropriate comments. He reported he was put into his
room as punishment because he would not respond to Staff 1’s
inappropriate comments. Youth A reported Staff 1 would make
inappropriate comments to him when no one was around so that
no one could hear them. He reported she would make comments
such as, “lick between my legs”. Youth A reported Staff 1 would
also tell him she wanted to “do weird stuff to his private parts.” He
reported the day they were in the gym, Staff 1 wanted Youth A to
touch her that day and wanted to “put her tongue on his private
parts.” Youth A stated he also heard Staff 1 say inappropriate
comments to Youth B that day in the gym but noted that Youth B
was going to deny it because he does not want to get anyone in
trouble. He reported Staff 1 makes him feel uncomfortable and
she made threats that she would harm him if he told anyone.
Youth A reported Staff 1 would get him in trouble for ignoring her
comments to him and would make up some excuse of why he
needed room time. He denied anything physically ever happening.
Youth A reported besides this situation, he feels safe at the
facility.
Youth B was interviewed face to face at the facility on June
17, 2025, in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Youth B
reported he has never had an issue with Staff 1 because of her
being too lenient on her consequences with the youth. He stated
that is why this whole situation happened with Youth A. Youth B
reported when they were on the basketball court, Youth A would
continue to steal his ball and play unfairly. He reported he told
Staff 1 about this and how frustrated he was. Youth B reported
Staff 1 was talking to him in private about this situation and Youth
A tried to overhear what they were saying. He reported Staff 1
3

continued to redirect Youth A to give space as she was having a
private conversation with Youth B. Youth A ended up getting an
hour of room time for not following staff directions. Youth B
reported Youth A refused to go into his room and continued to
write a grievance about Staff 1. He reported Youth A was telling
everyone that Staff 1 was having a private conversation with
Youth B because she was asking him to have sex with her. Youth
B reported Staff 1 never made any sexual comments or
inappropriate comments to him. He reported Youth A lied about
the situation. Youth B reported when Youth A was in his room, he
was making threats to Youth B stating he was going to beat him
up. He reported Youth A never did anything to him. Youth B
reported no one overheard his conversation with Staff 1. He
reported Staff 2 and Staff 3 were playing basketball with the other
youth when this happened.
Staff 1 was interviewed face to face at the facility on June 17,
2025, in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Staff 1 reported
she has been working at the facility since the end of March 2025.
She reported on Sunday, June 8, 2025, she was sitting in the gym
with the youth playing basketball. Staff 1 reported Youth A and
Youth B were playing on the court alone that she was watching,
while Staff 2 and Staff 3 were playing basketball with the other
youth. She reported Youth B had come up to her saying Youth A
was bullying him and hitting his ball. Staff 1 reported she
redirected Youth A to stop. She reported Youth B was upset with
Staff 1 because he felt Youth A should be disciplined more. Staff 1
reported she walked around the gym with Youth B to process the
situation, but Youth A kept following them around when she was
trying to have a private conversation with Youth B. She reported
she redirected Youth A multiple times about giving them space at
least three times. Staff 1 on the fourth time of redirection gave
Youth A the consequence of one hour of room time due to not
following staff direction. She reported Youth A was upset about
this and wanted to write a grievance outside of his room. Staff 1
reported Youth A continued to refuse to go to his room, so she
called for support which Supervisor arrived for support. She
reported Youth A was able to get coached into his room to do his
consequence. Staff 1 reported while Youth A was in his room he
was making verbal threats of assault to Youth B and herself. She
reported due to this he was given additional time in his room for
threats. Staff 1 denied she ever made sexual or inappropriate
comments to Youth A or Youth B. She reported besides this time
she only worked with Youth A couple of other times. Staff 1
reported she has never heard of a staff member making any
4

threats to youth, including Staff 2. She denied ever telling Youth A
that she was going to harm him or his family.
Youth C was interviewed face to face at the facility on June
17, 2025, in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Youth C
reported he has worked with Staff 1 and noted Youth A is
reporting Staff 1 is making sexual comments to Youth A and
Youth B. He denied Staff 1 ever saying anything inappropriate to
him. Youth C reported Staff 1 did give Youth A room time and
when Youth A was in his room, he stated to Staff 1, “You bitch,
you need to get off our pod.” He reported he needed to get out of
the facility and go home. Youth C reported Staff 2 had made
comments to him about beating him up when Staff 2 saw him
outside the facility. He reported he said this in front of Youth D.
Youth C could not remember when this occurred or where this
occurred. He denied any staff physically harming him at the
facility.
Youth D was interviewed face to face at the facility on June
17, 2025, in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Youth D
reported Staff 1 has never made him feel uncomfortable and
never said anything inappropriate. He reported Youth A is making
reports he heard Staff 1 say inappropriate things. Youth D
reported Youth A lies all the time on the pod to get out of trouble.
He reported he has also never heard any staff make threats to
youth about beating them in or outside of the facility. Youth D
reported he has never heard Staff 2 threaten anyone, including
Youth C. He reported Youth C is trying to get moved from the
facility because he wants to go home.
Youth E was interviewed face to face at the facility on June
17, 2025, in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Youth E
reported he has no concerns with Staff 1. He reported he has
never heard Staff 1 make any sexual comments to residents or in
general. Youth E reported Youth A is a liar and his biggest issue is
telling the truth. He reported Youth A was upset with Staff 1 for
holding him accountable for his actions. He reported Youth A did
tell him that he lied about Staff 1 making sexual comments but
now since it is being investigated, he is telling everyone to say it is
true. He reported he has never heard a staff member threaten to
harm a youth in or outside the facility. Youth E reported he has
never even heard staff swear at a youth.
Youth F was interviewed face to face at the facility on June
17, 2025, in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Youth F
reported he has no concerns with Staff 1 and has never heard her
5

say anything sexual. He reported that Youth A is reporting he
overheard Staff 1 say something sexual to Youth B in the gym.
Youth F does not believe that to be true. He reported he has not
heard staff threaten or swear at a youth. He reported Staff 2 is a
good staff and does their job well.
Staff 2 was interviewed face to face at the facility on June 17,
2025, in collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Staff 2 reported he
has been working at the facility for about six months. He reported
he has worked with Staff 1 and has never heard her make any
inappropriate comments to anyone at the facility. Staff 2 reported
he was in the gym on Sunday, June 8, 2025, playing basketball
with the youth and noted he was a float/support staff for all the
pods. He reported he did not see or hear any concerns during that
time. Staff 2 reported he did respond when Youth A was refusing
to follow his consequence of room time for not following staff
directions. He reported Youth A did go into his room with some
verbal redirection. Staff 2 reported he has never heard Staff 1
make threats to any youth, including Youth A, about wanting to
harm him or his family. He reported he has never threatened or
joked around with youth about beating them up in or outside the
facility. Staff 2 reported he has had limited interactions with Youth
C.
Staff 3 was interviewed via phone on June 23, 2025, in
collaboration with MDHHS Worker. Staff 3 reported on June 8,
2025, he was playing basketball in the gym with the youth. He
reported Staff 1 was sitting on the sidelines while he played
basketball with the youth. Staff 3 denied seeing Staff 1 speak with
Youth A or Youth B during the time in the gym as he was focused
on playing with the youth. He denied ever hearing Staff 1 at any
time say anything inappropriate to the youth and has had
professional boundaries with the youth. Staff 3 reported he has
never heard complaints from any youth about staff being
threatening or sexual towards them. He reported Youth A has a
history of lying to try to get out of consequences.
Supervisor was interviewed via phone on June 30, 2025.
Supervisor reported he does not remember exactly what
happened on June 8, 2025. He reported he was not on the
basketball court but did come to the pod when Youth A was
refusing to go into his room to do room time. Supervisor reported
he remembered Youth A was going off about being upset about
his consequence for room time given by Staff 1. He reported he
does not remember exactly what Youth A was saying during that
time. Supervisor reported he had no concerns about Staff 1’s
6

workability and reported she is always professional with the youth.
He has not seen or heard of her having any boundary concerns
with the youth.
Video Review:
Video record of June 8, 2025 during the time of 7:00pm to
7:23pm was reviewed by this consultant. The video recording is
within the gym room where Youth A and Youth B are playing
basketball alone on the court and Staff 1 is sitting on the side of the
court. All the other youth are playing on the other court with Staff 2
and Staff 3. Around 7:04pm, Youth B walks up to Staff 1 on the side
of the court and appears to be talking to her while Youth A continues
to play basketball. About a minute later, Youth B walked back to the
court to play, and Youth A walked up to Staff 1 who remained sitting
on the side of the court. A few minutes later, Staff 1 walked up to
Youth A and Youth B playing basketball and appears to talk with
them. She then talked with Staff 2 and left the gym. Staff 1 returned
to the gym in less than ten minutes. Around 7:15 pm she goes to talk
with Youth B on the side of the court. During that conversation, Youth
A approached Staff 1 and Youth B on several occasions. Staff 1
appears to engage with Youth A on several of those moments. Staff
1 and Youth B did walk to the other side of the court to be on the
opposite side of the court from Youth A. Then Youth A gradually
moved to the other side of the court where Youth B and Staff 1 were.
At 7:18 pm, Youth B goes back to playing basketball and Youth A
has a conversation with Staff 1 on the side of the court. All the youth
go back to playing basketball at 7:20 pm and Staff 1 goes back to
sitting on the sideline. Everyone leaves the gym around 7:22pm.
Staff 1 remained in camera view throughout the entire video. There is
no sound recording within the video.
Documents Reviewed
- Email from MDHHS Worker dated 06/13/2025- MDHHS
Worker reported she has reached out to Law Enforcement,
and they will be dismissing the case from a criminal end.
- Youth A Grievance from dated 06/08/2025- Youth A
wrote the following in his grievance form, “I was shooting
on the court next to the staff. She said I was ear hussling to
what they words, they was saying. She said she would give
me an hour because I hear her tell Youth B that she would
have sex with him and she would kill me.”
- Facility Incident Report completed by Staff 1 dated
06/08/2025- Staff 1 reported while on the pod, Youth A was
refusing to go to his room. When finally in his room, Youth
A told Staff 1 she was a “dumb bitch.” Staff 1 also reported
7

Youth A told the other youth, Staff 1 was trying to have sex
with Youth B. The report noted Youth A then proceeded to
tell Youth B that he was going to “beat Youth B’s ass” when
he gets out of his room. Youth A then told Staff 1 he was
going to beat her up next.
o Supervisor section of the report noted-
Supervisor followed up with Youth A and Youth A
reported he was trying to get a rise out of Staff 1.
- Facility Standard Conduct Policy- This policy notes,
“Staff should not use their position to become emotionally,
physically and/or romantically involved with juveniles.”
- Facility Professional Boundaries Policy- This policy
outlines how staff need to maintain professional boundaries
with all residents and their family members.
- Facility Sexual Abuse/ Sexual Harassment Policy- This
policy goes through how the facility has a zero tolerance for
any type of sexual abuse or sexual harassment of youth.
- Staff 1 Human Resource File- Staff 1 started working at
the facility at the end of March 2025. She has no noted
disciplinary actions within her human resource file. Staff 1
is up to date on all required training and onboarding training
which reviewed all polices in April 2025.
Analysis The facility is found in rule compliance as there was insufficient
evidence to support Staff 1 not being appropriate with the youth.
Throughout interviews, the majority of youth and all staff denied
ever hearing Staff 1 make threats to Youth A or say sexual
comments to Youth B.
Conclusion Violation Not Established
8

IV. RECOMMENDATION
Based on investigative findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. It is recommended that the current license status be
continued.
